name: Pletris (Vincent Jenei)
description:
What happens when you combine Tetris with the familiar platformer genre? In this Puzzle-Platformer, you can switch pieces, rotate, and solve puzzles as you complete the map.

  • Controls
    • Arrow Keys
      • Left & Right keys - move respectively.
      • Down Arrow - ground pound, switch.
      • Up Arrow - jump, use orbs.
